snippet: The Supreme Court must reaffirm the legal right of prisoners who are held without charges to challenge their detention.
abstract: Editorial urges the Supreme Court to reaffirm the right of prisoners who are held without charges to challenge their detention; notes court will get the chance when it reviews the case of Adnan Farhan Abdul Latif, Yemeni citizen who has challenged his detention at the Guantanamo Naval Bay prison facility.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court must reaffirm the legal right of prisoners who are held without charges to challenge their detention.

headline.seo: Delaying Justice at Guantánamo Bay, Cuba
